# glyphTintColor

**Instance Property**

The color to apply to the glyph text or image.

## Declaration

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var glyphTintColor: UIColor? { get set }
```

```swift
@NSCopying @MainActor var glyphTintColor: NSColor? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value of this property is `nil`, which applies the standard tint color for the current map style.

## Setting the Marker Content

- **glyphText**: The text to display in the marker balloon.
- **glyphImage**: An image to display in the marker balloon.
- **selectedGlyphImage**: An image to display when the user selects the marker.
